price: 12. Markay dareemeen cadaabkayagii, mise waxay billaabeen inay ka cararaan.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ أَحَسُّواْ بَأۡسَنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنۡهَا يَرۡكُضُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: falammā aḥassū basanā idhā hum min'hā yarkuḍūna
